Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
ServerModuleName_Description: Defines name of the module responsible for login page
HashModuleName_Description: Defines hash of the module responsible for login page
DemoLogin_Description: If set, denotes email address of predefined demo account
DemoPassword_Description: If set, denotes password of predefined demo account
InfoText_Description: Defines additional text message shown on login page
BottomInfoHtmlText_Description: Defines bottom text message shown on login page
AllowChangeLanguage_Description: Enables changing language on login page
UseDropdownLanguagesView_Description: If true, language selector is presented as a dropdown menu
